segments.text: Oh man, look at that kitchen getting flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling over the sink and soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle already, oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the kids, that boy's on a stool that's about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up to the cookie jar, pulling out treats like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there helping him, hand raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not noticing any of this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a peaceful yard, which makes the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone's going to slip or fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR
